metadata.Title: CVE-2011-4622 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
The create_pit_timer function in arch/x86/kvm/i8254.c in KVM 83, andpossibly other versions, does not properly handle when ProgrammableInterval Timer (PIT) interrupt requests (IRQs) when a virtual interruptcontroller (irqchip) is not available, which allows local users to cause adenial of service (NULL pointer dereference) by starting a timer.BUG: unable to handle kernel NULL pointer dereference at0000000000000128IP: [<ffffffffa10f6280>] kvm_set_irq+0x30/0x170 [kvm]...Call Trace: [<ffffffffa11228c1>] pit_do_work+0x51/0xd0 [kvm] [<ffffffff81071431>] process_one_work+0x111/0x4d0 [<ffffffff81071bb2>] worker_thread+0x152/0x340 [<ffffffff81075c8e>] kthread+0x7e/0x90 [<ffffffff815a4474>] kernel_thread_helper+0x4/0x10

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2011-4622` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.2.0-16-generic - 4.2.0-16.19
linux-image-4.2.0-16-generic-lpae - 4.2.0-16.19
linux-image-4.2.0-16-lowlatency - 4.2.0-16.19
linux-image-4.2.0-16-powerpc-e500mc - 4.2.0-16.19
linux-image-4.2.0-16-powerpc-smp - 4.2.0-16.19
linux-image-4.2.0-16-powerpc64-emb - 4.2.0-16.19
linux-image-4.2.0-16-powerpc64-smp - 4.2.0-16.19
linux-image-extra-4.2.0-16-generic - 4.2.0-16.19
No subscription required

linux-image-3.4.0-4-goldfish - 3.4.0-4.27
No subscription required

linux-image-3.4.0-7-mako - 3.4.0-7.40
No subscription required

linux-image-3.4.0-5-flo - 3.4.0-5.22
No subscription required

linux-image-4.2.0-1013-raspi2 - 4.2.0-1013.19
No subscription required

linux-image-4.4.0-1012-snapdragon - 4.4.0-1012.12
No subscription required

linux-image-4.4.0-1001-aws - 4.4.0-1001.10
linux-image-extra-4.4.0-1001-aws - 4.4.0-1001.10
No subscription required

linux-image-4.8.0-36-generic - 4.8.0-36.36~16.04.1
linux-image-4.8.0-36-generic-lpae - 4.8.0-36.36~16.04.1
linux-image-4.8.0-36-lowlatency - 4.8.0-36.36~16.04.1
linux-image-extra-4.8.0-36-generic - 4.8.0-36.36~16.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-4.4.0-1003-gke - 4.4.0-1003.3
